name: Name: Amazing Neo Brands
author: Amazing Neoâ„¢

sections.description:
Amazing Neo Brands Social Icons is an easy to use, display brands/social icons that link visitors to your social media profiles. easily customize the color and size of your icons, as well as align them to the left, center, or right, all from the widget area.
for more details click the link

Comming Soon

Download files in different formats
1. svg
2. psd
3. ai
4. eps
5. sketch
sections.installation:
Install like any other plugin, directly from your plugins page.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/amazing-neo-brands directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. In your Widgets menu, Drag the widget labeled “Amazing Neo /Brands Social Icons” into a widget area.
  4. Configure the widget by choosing a title, icon size and color, and the URLs to your social media profiles.

Which Brands/Social icons are included ?

  • bloglovin
  • dribbble

NOTE – All brand icons/logos that used in Amazing Neo Brands are trademarks of their respective owners. Use of these trademarks/logos does not indicate endorsement of the trademark/logos holder by Amazing Neo. Brand icons should only be used to represent the company or product to which they refer or with respective owners permission. Please do not use brand trademarks/logos for any purpose except to represent that particular brand or service.

short_description: Amazing Neo is one of the best icon font by Amazing Team. This plugin allows you to insert brands/social icons in any widget area.
